column2: "Ah, what? Oh, you're another ARKS member."
"...Thank goodness. I thought you might be an enemy."
"It's just that I really hate fighting..."
"I only applied to ARKS because it seemed really popular, then it turned out I had a natural aptitude..."
"To be honest, I don't want to do anything scary. I hope things turn out alright. ...Probably not though."
"Sorry for wasting your time. I'll just excuse myself..."
